document_data.name: Cavanter
document_data.mainbody: '''Cavanter''' plant was a bush or a shrub found in the [[King's Forest]] of [[Cormyr]], notably in the areas around [[Dathyl]], not far from the village of [[Espar]].
document_data.Description: Cavanter bush produced edible swelling green cavanter buds around late [[Tarsakh]]. The buds were eaten by [[humanoids]], as well as small brown birds of the forest, like the [[riskin]]. The buds could be eaten raw but were especially delectable when fried in [[butter]]. In terms of taste, they were similar to an [[olive]] or [[radish]]—crispy and fresh on the outside and soft, bready and chewy on the inside—while their texture was similar to that of a [[carrot]].
document_data.History: In [[1348 DR]], [[Florin Falconhand]] introduced [[Narantha Crownsilver]] to the joys of forest cooking, preparing her a hearty morningfeast of roasted [[rabbit]], baked [[brownfin]], and a heaping handful of chewy cavanter buds.
